root.str: <font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> WHOA! That's a long drop. You better look around while you're down here. Someone must have wanted to keep this place hidden for a reason.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Adds yellow chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler.
Flak Armor provides improved protection from nearby explosions
Fires IFF-enabled projectiles that can heal friendlies and infect enemies.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Check out the Bundles Depot Category for great deals on items for all classes and vehicles!
The Bingley RF offers two-times magnification for improved close quarters accuracy.
Death on the battlefield in service to your empire is the greatest glory you can achieve in your life. TR use only.
Apply the Digital Pumpkin camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
You have Battle Cash (BC) to claim! Head to the depot and hit the claim button.
The aircraft terminal allows your empire to purchase vehicles.

While active, health regenerates by 50 per second and you flinch 50% less when struck by projectiles. Receiving damage will momentarily pause the health regen granted by this ability. Ability lasts up to 15 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.

Designed with the intention of creating a weapon with the raw power of a hip-slung shotgun and the mobility of an LMG, Genudine's Demolisher GD-3 can put down squads of infantry, even while on the move.
<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Unfortunately we're not there yet. Keep your eyes on the countdown posted throughout Sanctuary for a better idea of how close we are to reaching our goal.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 40%.

Heavy Assaults can activate specialized short-duration shields to absorb a little more damage and increase their chances of survival against infantry and vehicles. These shields slow the Heavy's movement while active.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 11 minutes.
Increases experience gain by 50% for 1 hour. Boost can only be used on this character.
A forward grip increases control of the weapon, reducing horizontal recoil by 25%.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Hey, this is good stuff, Slick, real good. I think I got everything I need here. Keep an eye on your mailbox, I'll have something special coming your way.
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 8 seconds.
Allows use of the long range 7x TSO scope.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Death and Respawn - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
Increases the amount of ammo carried
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
The NMG spontaneously creates a dense projectile-absorbing shield around the user. This shield absorbs a set amount of damage, and will need to recharge after stopping several projectiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shells.
Allows the Infiltrator to spot enemy explosives
A set of cosmetic armor plates and accents suitable for seasoned Engineers.
Please review this information before confirming your purchase.

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Anyway. Nalla's handling the big picture stuff for the operation, so you're going to be stuck with me in your ear for the day-to-day details. Time to saddle up and drop down planetside. Contact me when you're ready to start.
This customization adds a Slate Blue decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
You have bound to this Elysium Spawn Tube. This allows you to respawn here from anywhere on the continent.
We encountered an error trying to process your purchase. Please try again.
Applies a Flat on the Floor decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Icarus Jump Jets provide significantly faster vertical thrust and fuel recharge rate at the cost of in-air maneuverability and overall fuel capacity.
User deployable anti-vehicular mine, activated by nearby enemy vehicles.
Could not kick from squad because you are not the squad leader.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> You have acquired enough Elysium. It will be transfered to us automatically. The contract is considered complete.
Pilots of ground or air vehicles that have multiple seats with attached weaponry can earn kills made by their passengers.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21 shells.
External Fuel Tanks afterburner fuel replenishment bonus increased to 70%.
Good. Now let's take you to a simulated fight. Redeploy now to get into the fight.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Needless to say, I've got a few tasks that need doing while you're out and about. Give me a call when you're ready to play. Catch you later.
Hotspots on the continent map indicate areas where there is heavy fighting.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.
Experiment with all weapons, vehicles and attachments in your empire's own VR Training simulator.
Vehicle terminals have a tank icon and are marked on your mini-map and heads-up display.

The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.
As squad leader, earn squad experience with at least 6 squadmates.
Health recovery increased to 52 and can now repair construction objects.
The Terran Republic has taken Mao!
Infiltrators make unique faction-specific sounds when cloaking and de-cloaking.
Apply the Macro Tigre camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Mosquito to 11 minutes.
Apply the African Forest camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Disrupts active lock-on missiles and blocks new lock-ons for 5 seconds. Can be activated once every 35 seconds.
Unlock the CB-200 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Reduces the time it takes to reload the weapon.
Secondary: Pistol: NS Heavy Pistol 02 placeholder name
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 18 minutes.
Increases the top speed of the Galaxy by 20 KPH.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.13% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Razor Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Your squad invitation to [*target*] has expired.
You have been disconnected due to inactivity.
Changes the vehicle's contrails to appear ethereal. TR use only.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Grassland Weapon Camo
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 1 second.
Half the price, twice the fun.
VS - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V6 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Apply the Palm camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.

A festive purple cap featuring the Vanu Sovereignty's logo.
(No XP Boost)

This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
While riding in the exposed vehicle seat, you receive an additional 33% maximum shield health.

They have the ability to use a cloaking shield which allows them to disappear from sight for a short period of time. This is useful because it can help them reposition their sniping point, move in for damaging melee attacks, or to sneak into enemy facilities and overload generators or hack terminals.
Increases the strafe speed of the Magrider by 2 KPH.
Happy Anniversary! Celebrate with this festive horn that releases a colorful burst of confetti.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 96 rounds.
Increases the Afterburner Fuel capacity by 100%.
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the range of the IFF device
NC need at least 36% territory control

Vehicle Gates are large walls with an opening wide enough for vehicles to pass through; when combined with a Structure Shield Module the opening will be sealed with an energy shield that will block enemy vehicles and large projectiles.
This customization adds a Dark Purple decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
Defend the Shield Console in the Hydroponics Lab
NC: MAX: Flame 01: Left Silver Medal
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 38%.

Alerts the owner and their squad when an enemy is detected or a construct is attacked within 100 meters of the alarm module. Will automatically deconstruct if owner is offline for more than 2 minutes.
The Quad 120mm Cannon Tank Destroyer is a high output weapon that is used to seek out and destroy enemy tanks
Increases the braking performance of the Prowler by 20%.
Your movements no longer trigger anti-infantry mines, and you are no longer targeted by Spitfire turrets.
Adds the Gold Shovel Head Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
This armor can only be worn by TR Heavy Assault troopers.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
A New Soldier enters the battlefield.
Kill enemies using any Prowler Top Gun.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin</font> That's enough cores for now. You can assist your fellow acolytes with their harvest as well, if you wish. Return to me when you are ready to proceed.
The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.
Gold Venril Sathir Bust Hood Ornament
Freelance NSO characters cannot create or join outfits. Please become a member to choose a home faction, and enjoy other benefits.
Friendly vehicles often back up unexpectedly when they take fire. The safest place to stand near them is to their sides.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Composite armor increases the Liberators base resistance to flak, light tank rounds and heavy tank rounds by 9, 20, and 25% respectively.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.

The Focused Proton EMP is a highly effective electromagnetic pulse plasma cannon. EMP plasma rounds can only damage shields but will also disable enemy deployables such as land mines. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.
Mega Gun Inflicts 3000 damage a shot
External Fuel Tanks causes afterburner fuel to replenish 15% faster.

In addition to implants, the Nano-Cycler can construct <font color="#7ff4ff">chargers</font> for your <font color="#7ff4ff">Power Core</font>. Lastly, constructing using three of the <font color="#7ff4ff">same</font> implant guarantees the product is <font color="#7ff4ff">not</font> that same implant.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Toggle Cloaking Device - This consumes energy while active and will recharge when not in use.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Brush camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
Applies a special kidRiot decal to your vehicle.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Scrub Vehicle Camo
Warpgate Terminals allow long range transportation for infantry units. It allows a soldier to travel to any linked location in an instant.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Lightning. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">MISSION</font> Change Class To Heavy Assault
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 13.125%
Revived soldiers come back with full health, Increases health regeneration rate of the Medical Applicator
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 6.67% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 8 seconds.
Apply the Indar Savanna camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Could not set squad flags because you are not the squad leader.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
Adds this customization to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Damage from impacts striking the sides of the vehicle is reduced.
The Howler mining laser can quickly extract Cortium from smaller nodes and wreck player made buildings, but will overheat during prolonged use. All factions can use this weapon.
We'll all say very nice things about you.
Contains several decals that can be applied to your armor, vehicle, or outfit. NC use only.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Wraps your Reaver in a heavy rust trim. For NC use only.
The Supernova FPC is charged with fast-moving armor-piercing plasma that is more effective against armored targets and inflicts less explosive damage. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 29 rockets.
Equip NE-11 PML in Tactical loadout slot, select related gear slot, and hold Fire to harvest.
Acquisition timers for all vehicles and MAX have been deprecated and cert points spent have been refunded.
Vanu Esamir's advanced weapon labs released the Flare VE6 to fill a variety of combat roles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 320 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Oh, looks like the timer isn't coming up on your HUD. It must be a you problem, because it's definitely not a me problem. Don't worry, I'll count in my head. One nantine... two nantine... hurry, hurry, time is a tickin'.
The M20 Kestrel couples a large magazine size with no damage falloff, allowing it to perform well against enemy aircraft at long range. NC use only.

Strict monitoring of shipments to and from Sanctuary makes it incredibly difficult to procure and install aftermarket weapon upgrades like the floating barrel, dynamic pellet counter, and smart choke integrated into this weapon.
DX11, robotic allies, spawn system revamp, and more.
Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Cyssor themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 15%, and your hold-breath time recharges 80% faster.
Changes the color of the vehicle's contrails to purple. VS use only.
Unlocks a full complement of attachment for the MKV-P Suppressed.
Now score points by eliminating enemy targets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 17.5%
Activate coolant systems that reduce incoming burning damage and prevent you from being detected by radar.
The Commando is built for utility in harsh environments and bears a deadly edge in close quarters combat.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Sunderer by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
Damaged and depleted shields recharge sooner

Upon detonation, this Revive Grenade releases a swarm of Rebirth nanites capable of healing fallen allies to 50% health.

2.5 second fuse.
Earned by the 5th consecutive month of membership or by upgrading your membership plan
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit by 26.5%; also increases the overheat threshold to 12.5 seconds.
Improves the ability of the Chimera to manuever in combat by improving steer rate, brake power, and reverse speed.
Increases the top speed of the Prowler by 2 KPH.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Elf horn. All factions can use this gear.
The deploy location is too low
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 9.17% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Increases the rotation speed of the tank.
The Vanquisher's performance is defined by its excellent stopping power over distance, delivered through a low recoil, three-round burst. NC use only.
You have not agreed to our User Agreement, therefore you are unable to purchase items.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.

Activate to override the Defector's cooling system regulators turning it into a walking bomb that explodes at the end of 12 seconds. While active, you gain 38% additional armor, lose 10% movement speed, and weapons no longer produce heat. If killed before the countdown is complete, you will be defused.
Eyes on an enemy ground transport!
The Anniversary Edition of the engineer's Nano-Armor Kit.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Continually removes trace amounts of CO2 from the soldier's bloodstream, allowing the soldier to hold breath longer while using long-range optics.
The receiver is fitted with a charge-up alternate fire which propels a single projectile at great speeds and with better accuracy. This module passively reduces magazine size by 4.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
(TR)(Sunderer) Reduces Damage taken from mines by 50% and other attacks from the bottom of the vehicle by 25%
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Further increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed.
NS Patriot Flare Gun Auraxium Medal
Outfits can gather map resources by capturing or claiming bases. These resources are used to construct powerful War Assets in the Outfit Armory.
An emission reducer makes the muzzle flash less visible to the enemy, but will increase the range at which you'll appear on enemy minimaps by 15m.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Flash by 90 seconds.

Increases healing and revive speed by 20%. Revives MAX units at 10% health.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 missiles.

The Proton RAD is an effective radiation plasma cannon. Upon impact, a 10 meter cloud of radioactive gas will harm targets inside the cloud for 10 seconds.

Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 360 seconds.
Increasing the slider to the right will increase mouse sensitivity when weapons are aiming down the sights. (Default 0.25)
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Your strafe speed is increased by 23%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Reduces damage from the top and rear by 10%, and the vehicle gains a 65% resistance to C4 damage.

The high-temperature colorants in the continuously burning in the Spectrum Skull are neither environmentally friendly nor comfortable, but beauty knows no pain.
+15% xp when worn

Scout Radar detects the movement of hostiles at a range of 80 meters.

Allows use of the mid-range 4x LX Mark IV scope.

A Campaign is an on-going story that evolves over the course of time. Learn more by visiting the Campaign tab on the Missions screen.
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 7%.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
Allows Main Battle Tanks & Liberators to be pulled from this facility (only if the facility has the appropriate terminals)

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 28 shells.
Damage from impacts striking the front of the Prowler are reduced by an additional 5%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Best part is that we can enhance your personal shields on site. Tech is still experimental though, and is only housed in a few consoles at allied Biolabs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
The Infiltrator's EMP Grenade can disable or destroy enemy equipment, drain enemy shields, and scramble their HUD.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 800 rounds.

Unlocks access to Carbines. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Infiltrator only.

Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Cert Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.

Increases the speed at which you harvest Cortium.
Nanite Systems is sending capable soldiers to investigate the calamity happening on Esamir. Interested? Then join up!

Standing still for 0.1 second provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots, and 50% resistance to common explosives until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave or Flak Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
This is the third chapter of our test campaign.

This customization adds a Grey75 decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Nice job, soldier. You've shown the enemy how to use an ANT. A long time ago those things were used to transport resources across the battlefield to power bases. Crazy to think about. Transmitting payment now.
When activated, the Harasser is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 14 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.

Toggle on to create Darius Shields around the rumble seats of the vehicle, protecting those passengers from direct fire. Damage done to shields drains power, shields will go down when toggled off or power reduced to zero. Power regenerates when shields are down and will regenerate to full within 20 seconds. Shields cannot be toggled back on until power reserve is greater than 25%

SPRK-33, a vendor for the Black Market, is constructing a miniaturized Skylance, but is unable to find a viable grav rotor. The NSO facilitator, Campner, has been known to fabricate such devices and may be willing to part with such proprietary schematics.
